Plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
Title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
Actors: Brad Pitt, Christian Slater, Virginia McCollam, John McConnell
tomatoConsensus: Despite lacking some of the book's subtler shadings, and suffering from some clumsy casting, Interview with a Vampire benefits from Neil Jordan's atmospheric direction and a surfeit of gothic thrills.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 21 nominations.
